caption.p: Effects of RosA on cardiac dysfunction. (A) Representative echocardiographs showing cardiac function from the various groups. (B) EF and (C) FS measured by echocardiography. Data are expressed as the mean ± S.D. ( n = 4–5). Significance was determined by ANOVA followed by Tukey’s test. ** p < 0.01 vs. Vehicle + I/R. EF: ejection fraction; FS: fractional shortening.
